name: PaintMan
description:
|| PaintMan ||

This is the jam submission for GAME3033

Student Name: Bohan Cheng

Student#: 101130599

HOW TO PLAY

Mix colors together to match the colored gate. If failed to get the correct color before opening the gate will get stunned for 3 seconds and lose health.

Mixing the same color will give bonus points when reaching the gate.

Any paint orbs will give a small number of points.

Controls:
Use 'A' and 'D' keys on the keyboard to move left and right.

'Escape' key to pause.
